Breadcrumbs are added via ul with a class of breadcrumb.

The breadcrumbs are displayed in a light gray text seperated by a forward slash /. The bread crumbs are rendered at the same size of all our small text, which is a font-size of 0.9em or approximately 12px. Breadcrumb font-weight is normal (400) with the exception of the current, or 'active' breadcrumb, which has a font-weight of 500 or 'semibold'.
